alert.note: Alert for Badlands Area; Bennett County Area; Butte County Area; Custer County Plains; Eastern Foot Hills; Haakon County Area; Mellette and Todd Counties; Northern Foot Hills; Perkins County; Pine Ridge Area; Tripp County; West Central Plains; Ziebach County (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 11 at 1:23PM MDT until October 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 323, 324, 325, 326, 327, 328, 329, 330, 331, 332, 333, 334, AND 335... .A cold front moving through the area Wednesday along with good mixing will bring strong winds into the region on Wednesday, especially north and east of the Black Hills. The combination of gusty winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels will produce critical fire weather conditions Wednesday. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 323, 324, 325, 326, 327, 328, 329, 330, 331, 332, 333, 334, AND 335... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 323 Northern Foot Hills, 324 Eastern Foot Hills, 325 Custer County Plains, 326 Pine Ridge Area, 327 Butte County Area, 328 Perkins County, 329 West Central Plains, 330 Ziebach County, 331 Haakon County Area, 332 Badlands Area, 333 Bennett County Area, 334 Mellette and Todd Counties and 335 Tripp County. * WINDS...Northwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 28 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Badlands Area; Bennett County Area; Butte County Area; Custer County Plains; Eastern Foot Hills; Haakon County Area; Mellette and Todd Counties; Northern Foot Hills; Perkins County; Pine Ridge Area; Tripp County; West Central Plains; Ziebach County
